abstract: JPMorgan Chase is disbanding an investment-banking unit that wagers the company’s money on hedge funds, leveraged buyouts and real estate, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase is disbanding an investment-banking unit that wagers the company’s money on hedge funds, leveraged buyouts and real estate, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: As hedge funds continue to close, some investors are turning away from them.

headline.main: JPMorgan Shuts Unit That Bets on Hedge Funds
